name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AskTube - AI YouTube Video Summarizer & Chat

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save time by summarizing and chatting with long educational YouTube videos.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly summarize YouTube videos and interact with content using AI technology.

🚀 Key Features:

📝 Quick Summaries: Concise, accurate video overviews
💬 Interactive Q&A: Ask questions about video content
🕒 Timestamp Navigation: Jump to relevant video sections
📚 Learning Optimization: Ideal for students and skill-seekers

🌟 Benefits:

⏱️ Time-Saving: Get video essence without full playthrough
🧠 Enhanced Learning: Interact with content for better retention
🚀 Boosted Productivity: Efficiently acquire new knowledge
🔌 Easy Integration: Seamless installation and usage

Transform your YouTube learning experience with AskTube!

# CHANGELOG
## 1.0.5 [2024.10.23]
Fix: extension not able to load on Chrome due to CSP Issue on Chrome 130+
